title.narrative: Third National Program for Community Empowerment in Urban Areas III

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to assist the borrower to ensure that the urban poor benefit from improved socio-economic and localgovernance conditions.

condition.narrative: The Borrower shall have its Financial Statements audited in accordance with the provisions of Section 5.09 (b) of the GeneralConditions.
at the level of each Project Province, cause to be established, prior to the commencement of Project activities in each ProjectProvince and thereafter maintain until completion of the Project.
at the national level, maintain, until completion of the Project: (i) the PMU (Satker), established in MPW, headed by anappropriately qualified Project Manager.
ensure that each of the PMU and the central PIU (Satker) are provided at all times with adequate funds and other resources andstaffed by qualified personnel in adequate numbers.
ensure that the Project Manual is made available to and applied by, at all times until completion of the Project, to OC andFacilitators and Participating Kelurahans.
shall ensure that each Participating Kelurahan shall apply, the Land Acquisition and Resettlement Framework to Sub-projectimplementation.
